articles.forms module

Forms for user registration and authentication.

Bases: UserCreationForm

Registration form for creating new users with roles.

class Meta[source]

Bases: object

model

alias of User

fields = ('username', 'email', 'role', 'affiliated_publisher', 'password1', 'password2')
__init__(*args, **kwargs)[source]
clean()[source]

Hook for doing any extra form-wide cleaning after Field.clean() has been called on every field. Any ValidationError raised by this method will not be associated with a particular field; it will have a special-case association with the field named ‘__all__’.

save(commit=True)[source]

Save the user with selected role and hashed password.

base_fields = {'affiliated_publisher': <django.forms.models.ModelChoiceField object>, 'email': <django.forms.fields.EmailField object>, 'password1': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'password2': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'role': <django.forms.fields.ChoiceField object>, 'username': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>}
